pages.title: Archeosite
pages.text: Archeosite is an alloy made out of Netherite, Cobalt and Osmium. Tought to be the first alloy to ever exist, Archeosite is a strong metal, better than Netherite in any way, shape or form.$(br)Netherite tools and armor can be upgraded to this material.
Raw Archeosite can only be crafted and is not naturally obtainable.
